name: Rocket.Maniac!
description:
MORONs Space Lab was attacked and some evil rockets were set free... 
Head of the Lab: DR. ECLIPSE appoints u to destroy as many rockets as possible
He also equips u with various weaponry, including the devastation ZXHyper  
Get on the mission soldier!

Controls:
or  to move,

 for BULLETS

 or  for the ZXhyper MISSILES

This Game was created for the new year event on IPS[International Programmer server] with the theme "ROCKETS".  A huge thanks to Helper Duck(ID: helper duck🦆#2522) for organizing the event.  I had a fun time participating🔥and making this game...💖
